channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 你的夹克或毛衣到腰带就结束了吗？如果没有巧妙地剪裁，你就错过了一个能让你看起来更高挑的窍门，这些时尚达人如是说。
item.description:
Does your jacket or sweater end at your belt? If it's not subtly cropped you're missing a trick that will make you look taller, say these stylish guys. https://t.co/ag7hcA7yZL https://t.co/ag7hcA7yZL

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 巴塞罗那椅伊姆斯休闲椅和长椅。经典，但过于夸张，被无情地淘汰，令人疲倦。是时候考虑一下这些设计师认可的、同样别致的替代品了。
item.description:
The Barcelona Chair. The Eames Lounge Chair and Ottoman. Classic, but overexposed, relentlessly knocked-off and just tired. It's time to consider one of these designer-approved, equally chic alternatives. https://t.co/aM7P4whbZ6 https://t.co/aM7P4whbZ6

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 观察：菲律宾向有争议的南海前哨基地提供补给的任务越来越危险。在一艘菲律宾海岸警卫队的船上，@felizysolo 报道了中国和菲律宾之间长达数小时的对抗。
item.description:
Watch: Philippine resupply missions to outposts in the disputed South China Sea are increasingly dangerous. Aboard a Philippine Coast Guard ship, @felizysolo reports on an hours-long confrontation between China and the Philippines. https://t.co/fezytouwKv https://t.co/fezytouwKv

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 美国人口普查局的最新数据显示，去年移民美国的速度加快，推动了主要大都市地区的人口增长
item.description:
Accelerating immigration to the U.S. boosted population growth in major metropolitan areas last year, new Census Bureau figures show https://t.co/625q7XDmrb https://t.co/625q7XDmrb

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 台积电的两家芯片工厂，一家在日本，另一家在美国，凸显了东京和华盛顿对高科技投资的不同态度
item.description:
The two TSMC chip factories, one being built in Japan and the other in the U.S., highlight different approaches in Tokyo and Washington toward high-tech investment https://t.co/kniIsqEkLy https://t.co/kniIsqEkLy

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 我们已经提前看到了 Z 世代管理的工作场所的模样。准备好迎接许多变化吧。
item.description:
We’re getting an early glimpse at what Gen Z-run workplaces will look like. Prepare for a lot of changes. https://t.co/gct8b3gPZh https://t.co/gct8b3gPZh

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 一些专业人士对加薪和晋升麻木不仁，他们追求的是不同类型的成功。"关键时刻是当你意识到下一个成就不会明显改变你的基本幸福感时"。
item.description:
Numb to raises and promotions, some professionals strive for different kinds of success. “The key moment is when you realize that no next achievement will significantly change your baseline happiness.” https://t.co/9bx8RCbkXn https://t.co/9bx8RCbkXn

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 杰拉尔德-莱文（Gerald Levin）已去世，他曾升至时代华纳的最高层，并策划了时代华纳与美国在线（AOL）命运多舛的合并。享年 84 岁。
item.description:
Gerald Levin, who rose to the top of Time Warner and orchestrated its ill-fated merger with AOL, has died. He was 84. https://t.co/w9ORx119pi https://t.co/w9ORx119pi

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 在接受 @JoannaStern 的独家专访时，OpenAI 首席技术官米拉-穆拉提（Mira Murati）解释了公司新推出的 Sora 人工智能视频工具及其推广计划。
item.description:
In an exclusive interview with @JoannaStern, OpenAI CTO Mira Murati explains the company’s new Sora AI video tool and how it plans to roll it out https://t.co/fLPwsj2D0D

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: Kaia Gerber 深知作为 nepo 宝宝的好处。"她说："我个人非常清楚这对我的好处，我绝不会说任何负面的话。
item.description:
Kaia Gerber is aware of the benefits of being a nepo baby. “I personally am very aware of all the wonderful things it has done for me, and I would never ever say anything negative about it,” she says. https://t.co/BnaTDhybtL https://t.co/BnaTDhybtL

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: "人们意识到，不住在洛杉矶或纽约也没关系"。亚特兰大大都会区长期以来一直是嘻哈艺术家、音乐家和职业运动员的聚集地，如今已成为电影和电视行业的圣地。
item.description:
“People realized it was OK to not live in L.A. or New York.” Long a hub for hip-hop artists, musicians and pro athletes, the Atlanta metro area has become a mecca for the film and TV industries. https://t.co/qBSBDaqAi5 https://t.co/qBSBDaqAi5

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 伊丽莎白-卡尔（Elizabeth Carr）是美国第一个通过试管婴儿技术出生的婴儿，她向无数听众讲述了试管婴儿技术是如何帮助她的母亲实现生育的。现在，她呼吁对这一程序进行保护。
item.description:
Elizabeth Carr, the first baby born by IVF in the U.S., has told countless audiences how the technology helped make it possible for her mother to have a baby. Now she's calling for protections around the procedure. https://t.co/E6JXvKxInH https://t.co/E6JXvKxInH

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 🎧 听：在今天的期刊播客中，@georgia_wells 将分析国会长期以来对禁止 TikTok 的推动，以及该公司如何进行反击。
item.description:
🎧 Listen: In today's episode of The Journal podcast, @georgia_wells breaks down Congress' long push to ban TikTok and how the company is fighting back https://t.co/EZGuBPOBIo https://t.co/EZGuBPOBIo

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 请看在接受 @JoannaStern 的采访时，OpenAI 首席技术官表示，该公司的文本到视频模型将于今年推出，但他回避了有关该模型如何训练的问题
item.description:
Watch: In an interview with @JoannaStern, OpenAI CTO says the company’s text-to-video model will be available this year but ducks questions on how the model was trained https://t.co/uym4vnZZmM https://t.co/uym4vnZZmM

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）在不到两周的时间里第二次公开警告说，在本周末的总统选举之前，有可能与西方国家发生核对抗
item.description:
Vladimir Putin warned publicly for the second time in less than two weeks of the possibility of nuclear confrontation with the West ahead of presidential elections this weekend https://t.co/eJXhixhd6u https://t.co/eJXhixhd6u

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 在一大批没有比赛经验的分析专家接管大联盟前线办公室二十年后，前球员在棒球高管中卷土重来。
item.description:
Two decades after a wave of analytics experts with no playing experience took over major-league front offices, former players are making a comeback in baseball’s executive ranks. https://t.co/t6pmNjS1dW https://t.co/t6pmNjS1dW

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 高盛承诺让更多女性进入高层。相反，高层人才表示，其他地方有更好的机会。
item.description:
Goldman Sachs pledged to bring more women into senior ranks. Instead, top talent says better opportunities are elsewhere. https://t.co/VcSsFcZ9eK https://t.co/VcSsFcZ9eK

item.description:

item.title: 一家有线电视巨头希望解决您所有的流媒体问题--在某些情况下，让其付费电视用户观看流媒体直播电视
item.description:

item.title: 一位来自芝加哥的设计师被她的客户委以重任，这位客户刚刚在佛罗里达州购买了一套汽车公寓。"他让我设计一个最酷的男人洞穴"。
item.description:
A Chicago-based designer was assigned a monumental task by her client, who had just purchased a car condo in Florida. “He asked me to design the coolest man cave ever.” https://t.co/8QCJo6mcw5 https://t.co/8QCJo6mcw5

item.title: 越来越多的女性抛弃配偶，独自前往凉爽的地方旅行。"你不必和别人一起安排任何事情，如果你想一日三餐都吃沙拉三明治，你也可以"。
item.description:
More women are ditching their spouses to travel to cool places solo. “You don't have to schedule anything with another person, and if you want to eat falafel for three meals a day, you can.” https://t.co/hoiZHKxIIZ https://t.co/hoiZHKxIIZ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 14, 2024

item.title: 美国财政部正在调查 1.65 亿美元与加密货币有关的交易，这些交易可能在哈马斯于 10 月 7 日袭击以色列之前为其提供了资金。
item.description:
The U.S. Treasury Department is investigating $165 million in cryptocurrency-linked transactions that may have helped finance Hamas before the militant group’s Oct. 7 attack against Israel https://t.co/IA9KdoUSZL https://t.co/IA9KdoUSZL

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 唐-莱蒙（Don Lemon）说，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）取消了与 X 公司的交易，因为马斯克对前 CNN 主持人对他的采访不满意
